p: Another compound exhibiting strong antiviral activity is FV-100. This compound has a high selectivity for VZV. Unfortunately, its activity was not observed in comparative studies of other herpesviruses ( Mcguigan et al., 2007). This drug was tested in a phase 2 clinical trial in comparison with valaciclovir for herpes zoster (NCT00900783) and in a phase 3 clinical trial in comparison with valaciclovir for the prevention of post-herpetic neuralgia (NCT02412917).
